EntrySubject: Received £75 for one recording session for S4C's Dechrau Canu, Dechrau Canmol prgoramme as a member of a choir. This is not ongoing work - it was one session of approximately 5 hours (SO 4.3 -Band 1 - Less than 5 hours per week)

EntrySubject: Councillor and Member – Community Councillor for Trecenydd, Penyrheol and Energlyn (intending to stand down at the next election and has not received any financial benefit as a councillor since becoming a Member of the Senedd).
